assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Lanadelumab_Submission_DiseaseStateOverview_Q10
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Lanadelumab/berotralstat will not be used in combination with other medications used for long-term prophylactic treatment of angioedema (e.g., concurrent C1-INH, lanadelumab and/or berotralstat use). However, in cases of switching, short-term concurrent use is permitted to provide adequate prophylactic coverage while lanadelumab/berotralstat reaches steady state levels in the patient
